skilllist.skilldesc:
When near a wall or turret, Grock gains 10% Movement Speed, 15 (+8*Hero Level) Physical Defense, and 18 (+4.8*Hero Level) HP Regen.

Each point of Grock's extra Physical Attack increases his Physical Defense by 0.5.

Grock charges his weapon with the <font color="a6aafb">Power of Nature</font> and then launches a powerful sweep, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+160% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s. Damage dealt will increase the longer the skill is channeled, up to 250%.

Using <font color="a6aafb">Power of Nature</font> near a wall will grant Control Immunity.

Grock conjures a stone wall at the target location, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies. The stone wall lasts 5s and can block enemies who try to pass through.

Grock charges in the target direction, dealing 360<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in his path and knocking them airborne.

If he hits a wall or turret during the charge, he deals an additional 360<font color="fba51f"> (+90% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and stuns them for 1.8s.

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Extreme burst with high Physical Defense.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers <%Num1> of Max HP.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Side Effect: Loses 25 Movement Speed for 5s upon dealing or taking damage.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Side Effect: Loses 25 Movement Speed for 5s upon dealing or taking damage.

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

recommendmasterplan.name: S2G Esports Qaro.
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc: Grock works well with heroes who have skills that synergize with walls, such as Moskov and Barats. With Grock's stone wall, they can CC enemies more easily with their skill mechanics.

strong.desc:
Grock counters heroes who are reliant on skills to deal Physical Damage, such as Terizla and Lapu-Lapu, thanks to the additional Physical Defense
from his Passive.

weak.desc: Grock is weak against Mages who can pass through obstacles or are very nimble like Novaria and Valentina, because his Passive and stone wall are not very effective against them.
